query.name: getExpDetail
query.sql: select t.item_id, (10000000 + t.item_id) item_num, t.period_id, t.regist_user_id, (select user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id = l.regist_user_id) regiest_user, l.regist_time, t.exp_time, ifnull(l.description,t.description) description, p.period_name, a.account_name, l.dr_amount, l.cr_amount from exp_item t,exp_period p,exp_item_line l,exp_account a where t.period_id = p.period_id and t.item_id = l.item_id and l.account_id = a.account_id and p.book_id = ${@book_id} and t.book_id = ${@book_id} and l.account_id = ${@account_id} and p.period_id = ${@period_id} order by t.exp_time

query.name: detail

sqls.executeSql: insert into exp_account_buget( account_id, period_id, amount, add_user_id, description, add_time, book_id) values( ${@account_id}, ${@period_id}, ${@amount}, ${@add_user_id}, ${@description}, now(), ${@book_id})

batchSql.cursor: select t.period_id + 1 as period_id, l.account_id, ROUND(ifnull(sum(ifnull(dr_amount,0)-ifnull(cr_amount,0)),0)/100,0)*100 amount, '按上月开销情况导入' description from exp_item t,exp_item_line l where t.item_id = l.item_id and t.book_id = ${@book_id} and t.period_id = ${@period_id} - 1 group by t.period_id, l.account_id
